document_data.name: Veteran Guild of Ravens Bluff
document_data.orgname: the Veteran Guild of Ravens Bluff
document_data.mainbody: The '''Veteran Guild of Ravens Bluff''' was a [[mercenary]] company based in [[Ravens Bluff]], but also active in the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] and the [[Vast]], around [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Organization: As well as infantry, cavalry, [[archers]], and [[wizard]]s, they also had a unit of [[priest]]s and even a musical unit composed of ten [[bard]]s to improve morale.
document_data.Contracts: They preferred work for governments or merchants, usually defeating pirates. They charged 1 [[gold piece]] per day for each member for their services.
document_data.History: The Society had by 1358 DR been recently founded by [[Giovanni|Giovanni the Drake]], who'd gathered many veterans of the [[Horde Wars]] living around Ravens Bluff.
